tool.name: PyMuonSuite Quantum Averaging
tool.command:
structure_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$structure.name') && #if $task.task == 'w': out_folder=\$(sed 's/.$structure.extension/_displaced/g' <<< '$structure.name') && ln -s '$structure' \$structure_name && #if $task.phonon.phonon_source_type == "castep": phonon_source_file_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$task.phonon.phonon_source_castep.name') && ln -s '$task.phonon.phonon_source_castep' \$phonon_source_file_name && castep_file_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$task.phonon.castep_file.name') && ln -s '$task.phonon.castep_file' \$castep_file_name && #else if $task.phonon.phonon_source_type == "dftb+": phonon_source_file_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$task.phonon.phonon_source_dftb.name') && ln -s '$task.phonon.phonon_source_dftb' \$phonon_source_file_name && gen_file_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$task.phonon.gen_file.name') && ln -s '$task.phonon.gen_file' \$gen_file_name && #end if printf "phonon_source_file: \$phonon_source_file_name
">>'$params_yaml' && #if $task.script_file: script_file_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$task.script_file.name') && ln -s '$task.script_file' \$script_file_name && printf "script_file: \$script_file_name
">>'$params_yaml' && #end if #if $task.calculator.calculator == 'castep' and $task.calculator.castep_param: castep_param_name=\$(sed 's/ //g' <<< '$task.calculator.castep_param.name') && ln -s '$task.calculator.castep_param' \$castep_param_name && printf "castep_param: \$castep_param_name
">>'$params_yaml' && #end if ln -s '$params_yaml' params.yaml && pm-nq -t w \$structure_name params.yaml && find * > tree.txt && zip -r out_zip.zip * #else if $task.task == 'r': unzip '$task.zipped_input' && pm-nq -t r \$structure_name params.yaml && cat averages.dat #end if

configfiles.configfile: #if $task.task == 'w': method: $task.method mu_symbol: $task.mu_symbol mu_index: $task.mu_index grid_n: $task.grid_n sigma_n: $task.sigma_n #set $k_points_grid_formatted = $task.k_points_grid.replace('__ob__', '[').replace('__cb__', ']') k_points_grid: $k_points_grid_formatted avgprop: $task.avgprop calculator: $task.calculator.calculator write_allconf: $task.write_allconf displace_T: $task.displace_T #if $task.average_T: average_T: $task.average_T #end if #if $task.random_seed: random_seed: $task.random_seed #end if #if $task.calculator.calculator == 'dftb+': dftb_set: $task.calculator.dftb_set dftb_pbc: $task.calculator.dftb_pbc #end if phonon_source_type: $task.phonon.phonon_source_type #end if

param.label: Structure File
param.help: The structure to make displacements to. The original file will be preserved. Accepted file types: CELL, CIF, XYZ (standard or extended).

param.label: Task
param.help: Task to perform with pm-nq. Either generate a displaced structures, or average those structures.

param.label: Phonon Type
param.help: The format of the phonon file.

param.name: phonon_source_castep
param.label: Phonon File
param.help: Source file for phonon modes.

param.name: castep_file
param.label: CASTEP Log (.castep)
param.help: The CASTEP log produced when generating the Phonon File.

param.name: phonon_source_dftb
param.label: Phonon File
param.help: Source file for phonon modes.

param.name: gen_file
param.label: Gen File
param.help: GEN formatted geometry file for DFTB+.

param.label: Script File
param.help: For convenience, this script file is copied to all output directories (optional).

param.label: Method
param.help: Method used to calculate thermal average

param.label: Muon Symbol
param.help: Custom CASTEP species that identifies the muon.

param.label: Muon Index
param.help: If the Muon Symbol is not present in the cell, then the atom in the cell with this index will be treated as the muon instead. Not used if the Muon Symbol is present. Defaults to the last atom in the structure.

param.label: Grid Points
param.help: Number of points to sample along each phonon mode or thermal line.

param.label: Sigma Number
param.help: Number of sigmas to sample in the harmonic approximation.

param.label: Averaged Property
param.help: Property to be calculated.

param.label: Calculator
param.help: Used to calculate the property.

param.label: Castep Parameters File
param.help: For convenience, this file is copied to all output directories (optional).

param.label: Write All Configurations
param.help: Whether to write a 'collective' file containing all the displaced positions.

param.label: Displacement Temperature
param.help: Temperature used to generate displacements.

param.label: Averaging Temperature
param.help: Temperature used when averaging property (optional). If unset, will use the same value as Averaging Temperature.

param.label: Random Seed
param.help: Seed to use for random generation.

param.name: zipped_input
param.label: Zipped Input
param.help: A zipped directory structure containing the output of the generate mode, and the results of running CASTEP or DFTB+ to generate the desired property.

tool.help:
Given an input muonated structure (containing a muon), displaces the muon along its normal modes and performs vibrational averaging. There are three steps to using this tool: 1. Generate displaced structures with `-t w` flag 2. Calculate the property for all displaced structures using CASTEP or DFTB+ 3. Average the proprty across all displaced structures with `-t r` flag
Note that currently only steps 1 and 3 are possible in Galaxy. In order to perform step 2, download the zipped output of step 1, run CASTEP/DFTB+ elsewhere, re-zip the directories including the output properties, and finally run step 3 using this zip file as the input.
Command-line usage: pm-nq [-h] [-t {r,w}] structure parameter_file
.. _Generate muonated structures: /tool_runner?tool_id=pm_muairss_write
